website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy stand for the price, but moving it around is a pain, making it less useful than it could be.
pros: Quick setup and easy saw mounting
Stays aligned and rigid once set up
Included wheels make moving saw around job sites a bit easier
cons: Very tricky to close up or move when a miter saw is installed
Stand’s height is too low for taller users
Top-heavy and difficult to lift and roll

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat it for the price. Very good deal.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for several months and it gets heavy use on the weekends. So far it’s has been worth every penny. The laser is nice, it’s good size. I do wish it slid front to back. Easy to make angled cuts. I like it. I would buy it again and would recommend this saw to all. You can’t beat it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan E.K.

customer_reviews.title: Good saw, clamping design needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a great saw. I really like having the laser guide to assist with alignment. The blade is solid and cuts easily. The whole unit is not too heavy and is pretty straightforward to assemble. There are a couple of quirks that I think could be addressed...after about 20 or so uses, the clamp stripped out. This was a real bummer for me, as the clamp supplied was very handy for smaller pieces of wood. I liked having the option of moving the clamp to the right or left side, however when the clamp is used on the right, sometimes it gets in the way of the saw motor when you're dropping the blade.
customer_reviews.author: aarellano

customer_reviews.title: Started smoking and nearly caught on fire within 6 weeks of use.
customer_reviews.text: Unit malfunctioned and started smoking after it’s forth use. Cut between 20-40 strips of wood over a six week time frame. Contacted the manufacturer and they will not send me a pre paid postage label to send it to them for repair or replacement. Highly disappointed and learned an important lesson. Won’t be buying power tools anywhere except my local hardware store from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda R.

customer_reviews.title: Good stand but not up for any rough use
customer_reviews.text: Overall I have to say it's so-so. If you use this at home or for a few projects here and there, or are really nice to your tools this is fine. Pros Does not wobble, folds easily, works well not super heavy Cons I had the screws that serve as the axles for the rollers come out twice. the rollers got bent into the holder, this is probably somewhat my fault for using it roughly, and I broke the handle that locks it in on one side and broke the other piece of plastic on the other. Was on here to see if they had a set of brackets you could get but they don't
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: I dropped my old mitersaw off the work bench, on it's head, and it didn't come back alive. I needed a new one ASAP, and I didn't want to spend $300 on one. This one got here in 2 days, and I just love it!!! For a saw, it is pretty quiet. Cuts like a pro. The blade seems to be off by about a degree or two, but I just stuck a toothpick on one end since I am too lazy to read the instructions and adjust it. Eventually I will do that. I am using it to trim out windows and doorways and all my cuts have been perfect. And it is pretty spiffy looking too!!
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: I always mess with a power tool few days before I am satisfied its working well
customer_reviews.text: I had made a picture frame square for the table saw sled, I built, but sometimes it just didnt come out EXACTLY...which is kinda required with picture frames if ya dont want to do alot of sanding, etc. Got the saw few days ago, I always mess with a power tool few days before I am satisfied its working well... anyways... long story short, entire house has multiple designed-GENESIS GMS1015LC CUT PICTURE FRAMES... VERY PLEASED, WILL PURCHASE ANOTHER FOR A FRIEND. My only thing is, battery laser light. Should have been in the wiring. I'll buy $20 LED light, hot glue it in place, and never use the laser light afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Gary M.

customer_reviews.title: 4 months of daily use, works great!
customer_reviews.text: I'm am a furniture maker and I use this saw daily. It is accurate, powerful and has a laser (which is the reason I bought this one). I do wish the laser was more powerful. Sometimes it's hard to see the laser, depending on how the sun is shining. Overall, Awesome buy, awesome value! All of my furniture was made using this saw. I would definitely buy again and recommend!
customer_reviews.author: G.B.

customer_reviews.title: Great saw for the money!
customer_reviews.text: For 100 bucks I thought I would get a light-duty piece of crap. Not so. the frame is cast alum, very sturdy. Enough power to cut anything I will be cutting (2 X 4). the cuts are dead on and have adjustments to keep them there. I imagine the motor is bushings since no mention of ball bearings but will last me for all I do for many years. I like the size, weight, power, build, and for a price that allows me to get other toys, I dream of.
customer_reviews.author: R. Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its OK No Storage for Blade Wrench Cannot align the Laser Correctly
customer_reviews.author: conoco

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This miter saw stand fits my Milwaukee 12 inch sliding saw. Milwaukee hasn't made a decent miter saw stand, so I figured I would buy this one in the mean time because I wanted one with wheels. (Milwaukees miter saw stand doesn't have wheels) And this thing works great. Very solid. As an avid DIYer, this thing works great around the house or helping neighbors and friends. The wheels really help get this thing around. The wheels could be bigger, but for under $100 bucks (on the used section - CPO tools/amazonwarehouse section) you can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Pleasetouchmybut

customer_reviews.title: Time saver.
customer_reviews.text: Don't know how I ever lived without this. I would say this is a must have for everyone from the professional to the weekend warriors who want to tackle a small project. Every aspect of this is fully adjustable (except overall height). Coupled with my compound miter saw this is the most used tool in my garage. I have used it for over a year and have packed it around to numerous jobs. Has held up well - only issue I have had is the adjustable foot fell off, which I was able to fix.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Unit overall was great. Easy to put together and align everything
customer_reviews.text: Unit overall was great. Easy to put together and align everything. Have completed 2 different projects with some off angle cuts and everything went well.
customer_reviews.author: puppylove5638

customer_reviews.title: Good saw, not bad at all for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent saw. I bought this saw to finish the baseboards in my house and so far it’s seen only 50+ cuts. So far so good though. The only downside is if anything you’re cutting is taller than 3”, you won’t be able to cut it vertically. Basically, you will have to do a bevel cut instead of a miter cut. This is due to the frame of the saw blade being too low, it will contact the piece you’re working with and won’t let you cut all the way through.
customer_reviews.author: Austyn

customer_reviews.title: plenty of bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.text: use this saw alot more than i thought i would and for the money totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Nic G

customer_reviews.title: Good chop saw !
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a professional type saw, this won't be for you, but for the average DIY dad around the home this is a pretty good chop saw. I'd liked a position control (keeps the blade a bit above the cutting surface, but other than that fits my needs well
customer_reviews.author: heather Ogden

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this for the price. Wish I had bought it several projects ago though! It's my first time using this type of tool (as a novice to intermediate DIYer) but I had no issues! Quality seems great (I've nothing to compare it to though) and price was definitely good!
customer_reviews.author: justinetn

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: One of the outriggers in not square with the other. I will probably cut it off with my Metabo and weld it into the proper position. I am very disappointed that something so critical to the workings of the stand was done so poorly. I should have sent it back but I am in the middle of a move , and it's much easier for me to fix it myself. I feel pretty sure that I will not purchase anything with the Genesis name on it again.
customer_reviews.author: Chasbeaux

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase and amazing value definitely getting my money's worth ...
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase and amazing value definitely getting my money's worth use it a lot for my house I'm remodeling
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful price for this.
customer_reviews.text: In LOVE with this! First time using a saw like this. My most concert was safety, and this has me feel so much better. It's so nice, the labor is cool, cuts great. I'm so happy. Ive learned so much. Having to do everything myself cause of a construction crew that took my money and ran off. They destroyed so much it's crazy. I'm trying to fix everything. Without this idk what id do.
customer_reviews.author: Shy

customer_reviews.title: Life is so much easier now
customer_reviews.text: Don't know why we didn't buy one of these sooner. We've been cutting the baseboards by hand. OMG! This unit is very easy to use. it's the right size for our purposes. Sometimes the cuts are a bit slanted, don't know if that's the machine or the operator... perhaps the operator.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Good for.the price but I would go with better well known brand like DeWalt next time
customer_reviews.text: The angle indicator was crooked and misaligned a little. First couple of crown molding cuts I made were off a little and I had to use the protractor for every cut to make sure. Pretty good tool for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't Be Better!
customer_reviews.text: I've seen several miter saw stands that cost significantly more: DeWalt and generic. I like this one the best. It was less expensive, but of a perfect design. The saw-mount slides smoothly; the reach of the roller supports is wide enough to support full length lumber. It even has the innovative design of having wheels for easy transport (when folded up); not even the more expensive makes have this feature. Well built of heavy-duty, tough material. Easy to set up. Worth more; the low price is merely another "perc". A great addition to any workshop!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Scott

customer_reviews.title: Product malfunction and poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: The product worked for the first two times I used it. The third time, the product started smoking and the blade would not stop running even after releasing the safty button. I was with my 5 yr old which made the situation worst and had to pull the plug quick to shut the power down. After a bit and making sure everything was in starting position, I plugged it back in and the blade starting running again by itself. Very scary and dangerous. I reached out to customer service about the situation and it has only been crickets, NO RESPONSE.
customer_reviews.author: Donald M Healey

customer_reviews.title: Damage and Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: When the box arrived, it had damaged, so we opened up the box right away to make sure there wasn’t damage to the table. The item had two dents, but still functional. We also noticed that the wheel clamps were missing. Can you please send us the clamps?
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Ziska

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to make 45° angle cuts. I was wandering why 2 45° degres angles did not fit together. After checking what went wrong I found that the laser waas lot aligned and the settings where not exact. Do not wast your money buying this poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Reiner

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy poorly made
customer_reviews.text: Horrible I did not open the box for a month i opened it today made 2 cuts and now the saw does not work DO BOT BUY wheres my refund
customer_reviews.author: Casey b

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing, it really makes getting the right cut on moulding very easy. Very cost efficient device to have around if you like fixing things around the house
customer_reviews.author: J&M

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for $$
customer_reviews.text: Considering other saws are double the amount, this one is great for the money. The only thing is that the guard isn't very high, so cutting large crown molding is difficult.
customer_reviews.author: KerryAnn

customer_reviews.title: Missing Part
customer_reviews.text: Sent me missing parts , and I have to buy more parts to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Henry H

customer_reviews.title: It didn't even start 🤦‍♂️🤦‍♂️🤦‍♂️
customer_reviews.text: I am getting ready to remodel my third floor apartment, so i was in need of one of this since the one i have is 10 years old. It finally came in after waiting 4 days for it. I was so exited to set it up and start doing the work, but guess what? The thing didn't even start! When i plugged it in it resets my gfi. Now here i am waiting for my money back and no saw. What a headache!! Over all good looking saw for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this cheap saw
customer_reviews.text: I made three cuts with the saw before it malfunctioned. Something was not set up correctly from the factory and the guard caught the blade resulting in a large accident. The guard got ripped off and flung into the machine. I tried to return it but do to a UPS location, and my schedule I was never able to get to return it in time. Very disappointed in this saw and wouldn’t recommend it to anyone who likes their fingers and other body parts.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Harwood

customer_reviews.title: Great for me!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant because of the price (you get what you pay for) but this is a great deal for a great price! I wanted a smaller saw for crafting and my needs but this is perfect. It's not too big, it's not too small plus the ability to angle from any direction is great. The laser is a plus and very helpful. I have had this for about a week and used it daily. It has worked without fail every time. I would recommend this for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Myers

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I’d never used a miter saw before. I was able to cut baseboard accurately with this saw day 1! Great value for the money. I won’t use it frequently, but good to have on hand for the occasional project.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy S

customer_reviews.title: It’s pretty impressive
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for his birthday, his words after his first time using it “it’s pretty impressive.”
customer_reviews.author: legrizz

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding value
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding value.The only one any where near the price with supports with stops on both ends. i like that I can store my saw on the stand and stand it on end. Saves space in my garage
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: other than that works great.
customer_reviews.text: did not realize my mitr saw had angled mounts to attach to this. I slide and bolted a piece of wood to the mounts to make it adapt to my saw. wheels are kind of small but not a big deal to me. other than that works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: D the Toolwoman Mackin
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot House projects I want to do. The first of them was putting trim around my windows and this was easy to use and precise in cutting. Luv the laser feature.
customer_reviews.author: D Mackin

customer_reviews.title: Unable to cut square ends
customer_reviews.text: Backstop not square. It bevels inward on each side. Ok if long board but not for cutting an end. Emailed company and got no response.
customer_reviews.author: Paul's review

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: If you're wanting a saw that only works for a few months... This is perfect. It worked great for a few months and then broke and now I have no way of contacting them other than this review.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Young

customer_reviews.title: Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Quality Miter Saw! Perfect for home projects. Fast shipping. Good deal.
customer_reviews.author: oswald

customer_reviews.title: Accurate laser and guides, easy set up ... makes the cut!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Returned a Hitachi for this one. Once I get a project done I'll do an update.
customer_reviews.author: aaron-the-baron

customer_reviews.title: even the oldest  testament started with GENESIS
customer_reviews.text: receiver really liked it - was a gift from me. Quality good - packing excellent & timely shipping .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this saw
customer_reviews.text: Love it! great quality! A precise instrument. Thanks for this.
customer_reviews.author: Orin Conant

customer_reviews.title: May be a fire hazard.
customer_reviews.text: Saw works for simple small cuts. However, any angled cuts or longer cuts the motor began smoking. The correct blade was being used but the saw didn’t seem to have enough power. I do have safety concerns and missed the opening to return the product.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Works like it should!  Big pieces of wood are now smaller pieces of wood.
customer_reviews.text: I just needed a chop saw. It does exactly what it should.
customer_reviews.author: David E. Smiley

customer_reviews.title: Work nicely.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to help building outdoor kitchen. Gave it 5 stars as it works really nicely. If you are wanting to cut 4x4, the cut is just a tad short, so go for 12 inch instead. Otherwise 2x4 cuts without an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos R.

customer_reviews.title: Very good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Thanks to this tool I built my deck. Easy to cut wood and to use. For this price you cannot beat it.
customer_reviews.author: alexthebobo

customer_reviews.title: Making Amazon look like crap!!
customer_reviews.text: Over a month wait for recall on a switch. I was told the warehouse caught on fire and would be receiving a new unit..... Meanwhile projects at home are not touched. Now two months and nothing has shown at my door. Frustrating with the product !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: seems to be great
customer_reviews.text: works fine for a low end miter. A stop block is critical to exact multiple cuts. Laser does not denote the actual cut. Overall for an amateur just starting woodworking I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Orvil L. Tice

customer_reviews.title: value
customer_reviews.text: Fit of some of the component is not great. Worth it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: RobMckenner

customer_reviews.title: Great tool in affordable price.
customer_reviews.text: I have used it for my recent miter cut needs and I am pleased with the accuracy and durability. Great tool in small price.
customer_reviews.author: Shakeel A.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I love it and the whole family uses it. The laser is spot on! Easy to handle and would definitely recommend it to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Perry

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I plugged it in and it tried to run off the back. The motor seemed to be seized it just smoked up on start up. I rather just go to Home Depot and get one now I don’t trust anything online anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Romo

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my son who is finishing his basement. He loves it, says it makes the project fun!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L. Otto

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe product
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this a couple of times since I bought it. Today it basically fell apart while using it. Unsafe product!
customer_reviews.author: Dan P

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this saw!!
customer_reviews.text: The saw motor burn out cutting 2x4 and it’s only beef 5 Months
customer_reviews.author: Louis Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I mated my Hitachi 8 1/2 inch sliding compound miter to the saw stand, used it all week long and it performed flawlessly. I recommend this to anyone looking for a new saw stand.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Mummery

customer_reviews.title: Everything is great except one of the posts for a knob was ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great except one of the posts for a knob was welded at the wrong angle so you can't attach the knob. Working on getting a replacement bracket shipped.
customer_reviews.author: C. Benton

customer_reviews.title: Love the laser
customer_reviews.text: Handy little guy to take with me. Works great and it's really gotten a workout with my remodel projects.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Wilke

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with rust stains on it. Thought about returning but figured i could live with it. Seems well made, fits my dewalt saw and is easy to use. i'd give it 5 stars but when i buy a new product i don't want it to look worse than tools that have sat here for years
customer_reviews.author: Bryan M

customer_reviews.title: Not built very well.
customer_reviews.text: Saw cuts good. Top handle broke off about the 3rd use. Spend a few extra dollars and get a name brand. I will only use this a few times a year. If you need it for work don’t buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and handles my 12 inch sliding ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and handles my 12 inch sliding saw without a problem. Sturdy design is strong enough but I wish it was somewhat lighter and had better wheels. All in all it does the job at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: radius1

customer_reviews.title: Works great and repeat cuts are a breeze
customer_reviews.text: Did not use this for months but once I set it up I don't know why I waited. Works great and repeat cuts are a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Bray McClendon

customer_reviews.title: Alright for home projects
customer_reviews.text: Saw works good for simple cuts. Will not cut all the way though 1x6 on angle cuts.
customer_reviews.author: Heath c.

customer_reviews.title: Value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this miter saw for over a year. Have no complaints, it has treated me very well.
customer_reviews.author: Yeudi Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Garbage. Purchase a different brand.
customer_reviews.text: The bevel lock handle broke on third use. About one month after the return window closed. Complete and utter trash.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Saw is ok.
customer_reviews.text: The miter saw is ok ,thought I was Buying a slider miter saw. Going back should have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: alan l. tompkins

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!!
customer_reviews.text: So far very easy to use. Husband is doing baseboards and he may finish this coming year 😄
customer_reviews.author: Bessie Keane

customer_reviews.title: I'm 6'3" so this stabd is a little short for ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'3" so this stabd is a little short for me but it works very well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good little saw
customer_reviews.text: I like it, however it was very hard to unlock it, it seemed as if it wasn't oiled.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: We have only used this twice in the 5 weeks we have had it just passed the return date and it’s already stopped working!
customer_reviews.author: Mikayla Porter

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase this product
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made. Returned product after the blade retaining fastener loosened and stripped the screws.
customer_reviews.author: Layne

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. Not easy to adjust angle to make 90 degree.
customer_reviews.author: Liang D.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very handy stand. Wheels could be larger for rolling on uneven surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good stand
customer_reviews.text: Some shipping damage that needed to be fixed. Better packaging would help. But all in all it is a very sturdy stand and holds up a large mitre saw with ease.
customer_reviews.author: T. Omholt

customer_reviews.title: Great Stand
customer_reviews.text: Just as sturdy and the dewalt or any other stand!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift For a Woman Who Likes Tools
customer_reviews.text: For my birthday, I bought myself the Genesis GMSS400W heavy-duty saw stand. My older Hitachi mitre saw anchors to the saw stand perfectly. Took minutes to put together, and immediately I used the stand and mitre saw to cut some frames, and the stand was very solid to work with. The stand weighs a bit for this tool gal, but with the rolling wheels on one end, it was no problem moving it around. Really like the product and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Scheffler

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: This saws safety cover broke off after the second day using it! Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: leah ronk

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: Mobility is great. Previous one did not have wheels. Hard to move.
customer_reviews.author: Tom David

customer_reviews.title: nice saw stand
customer_reviews.text: i got a huge bosch dual bevel miter saw connected to this. fairly heavy but well built. i love it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Danner

customer_reviews.title: Not able to get the nut that holds the angle ...
customer_reviews.text: Not able to get the nut that holds the angle of the blade to tighten. Have not had time to take it apart to see what the problem is with that. Other than that it is what I expected
customer_reviews.author: Lori Hardy

customer_reviews.title: I was pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased with my purchase. It fit my Dewalt miter saw and I like how u can roll it around. The only thing I didn't like is if you loosen the adjustment knobs too much they come off. Along with a spring and another part. If you're aware of that and don't loose the parts it works good. The price was right too.
customer_reviews.author: Sean McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: fits my makita 12" saw perfect!. Price is great, good product.
customer_reviews.author: Long Le

customer_reviews.title: satisfied with this product
customer_reviews.text: very well constructed. minimal assembly required. satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Roler

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy stand
customer_reviews.text: I really love this stand. It was easy to put together and seems solid enough. Since I have two different saws for different applications it would be nice if Amazon also sold extra brackets. The company does not list them on their website, but you can call them and purchase over the phone, if you can get a person and not the answering machine.
customer_reviews.author: HFL

customer_reviews.title: Good Job, Genesis.
customer_reviews.text: Solidly built, intelligently and economically designed. Parts fit, tolerances were within expectations. The machine does what it is designed to do. GOOD JOB.
customer_reviews.author: J. Payne

customer_reviews.title: Overall a great bargain. It does the job quite well
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great bargain. It does the job quite well. The only issue that I have is that the extendable supports seem to stick all the way in and it take a good rap with a chunk of wood to loosen them. Also, the tightening knob should have a pin through the bottom. It has a tendency to come off when loosening and then I'm picking up pieces. Small things that would make this a 5-star review if addressed. I still recommend the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Great price on this product
customer_reviews.text: I needed a chop saw and stand to remodel my kitchen. I didnt want to spend a lot since I use my table saw most other times. I bought a 12 in Hitachi and this stand and was blown away at how accurate and handy this saw and stand were for the price. Whenever one of my helpers saw this stand they were amazed at how much it could do and how sturdy it was. The wheels on it are actually pretty handy. you cant go wrong on this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RussM

customer_reviews.title: Best buy for a saw stand
customer_reviews.text: It is rigid and stays aligned. Very good value for the price. Easy assembly and included the proper parts to keep operating for years.
customer_reviews.author: Rex Page

customer_reviews.title: good stand for the money
customer_reviews.text: well built works as good as much higher price stands that I have used easy to use well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: ROGER ZIMMERMAN

customer_reviews.title: much better than other stands I have
customer_reviews.text: solid, well designed, much better than other stands I have used
customer_reviews.author: flyfishermantoo

customer_reviews.title: Seller and stand
customer_reviews.text: Complete deception on the sellers part. Said package was slightly damaged and all parts were there. I'd say half the parts were, and not to mention the bent bracket on one of the extending arms. The saw stand itself does not fit well with my 12" dewalt. Weight proportion is no good, very back heavy. Feels like the saw and stand is going to tip backward when letting up on a cut. Would not recommend with a dewalt saw, that's for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Hubby's Best Christmas Gift!
customer_reviews.text: My husband put this together in no time today - attached his new Miter Saw and rolled it downstairs to the basement . Very sturdy. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Nan of the Sea

product_meta.title: Genesis GMSS400W Universal Heavy-Duty Folding Miter Saw Stand with Quick-Release Mounting Brackets, Tool-Free Adjustment, Wheels, and All-Steel Construction
product_meta.description: Style:Miter Saw StandThe Genesis GMSS400W Heavy-Duty Miter Saw Stand gives you an instant portable work station wherever you need to use your miter saw. This stand is a work horse, supporting up to 400 lbs. It accommodates all Genesis and most other miter saws, including 12" sliding miter saws. The roller supports are adjustable for height and length with no tools needed and can be extended up to 110". The quick-fold design and wheels make for easy transportation and storage, even with the saw mounted. An adjustable foot keeps the stand level on uneven surfaces.
feature_bullets: Heavy-Duty All Steel Construction-Supports up to 400 Lbs
Quick-Release Mounting Brackets for Easy Miter Saw Mounting and Removal
Tool-Free Adjustment of Material Supports and Extension Arms, Material Supports Include Rollers and Positive Stops for Repetitive Cuts
Accommodates All Genesis and Most Other Miter Saws, Including Genesis 12" Sliding Miter Saw
Quick-Fold Design and Wheels for Easy Storage and Portability

specifications.Included Components: 2 Year Warranty, Wheels for Ease of Mobility, Miter saw stand with Extended rollers, Owner's Manual
specifications.Warranty Description: Backed by the Genesis 2 Year Manufacturer Warranty with US-Based Customer Support
